snippet: The Texas Ethics Commission is up for review under the state’s sunset law, which requires lawmakers to reauthorize state agencies every few years.
lead_paragraph: The Texas Ethics Commission is up for review under the state’s sunset law, which requires lawmakers to reauthorize state agencies every few years.

headline.seo: In Texas, Slim Chance for Lawmakers to Police Themselves
headline.main: A Slim Chance for Lawmakers to Self-Regulate
headline.print_headline: A Slim Chance For Lawmakers To Self-Regulate
